Group (2023-present):
ZEROBASEONE

Introduction

Sung Hanbin is a South Korean singer under Studio GL1DE. In 2023, he participated in the hit survival show 'Boys Planet,' where he became an instant crowd-favorite and ultimately ranked 2nd place in the final episode, securing his spot in the group ZEROBASEONE.

He made his official debut as the leader of ZEROBASEONE on July 10, 2023, with the mini album "Youth in the Shade," under the management of WAKEONE.
